Comments_List: The course had a fascinating syllabus, and the discussions were always very engaging. However, I would have preferred the course to have a clearer arc explaining how all the disparate weeks of material hung together.
I would recommend this course to someone who was very self-directed and already had existing interest and knowledge in the topics discussed.
Absolutely. Both Professor Yaffe and Tyler were tremendous.
